fields.name: width
fields.description: The field for the width record component.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The field for the height record component.

fields.name: scale
fields.description: The field for the scale record component.

fields.name: elementShader
fields.description: The field for the elementShader record component.

fields.name: colourScheme
fields.description: The field for the colourScheme record component.

fields.name: performance
fields.description: The field for the performance record component.

constructors.name: DisplayContext
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a DisplayContext record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: width
methods.description: Returns the value of the width record component.

methods.name: height
methods.description: Returns the value of the height record component.

methods.name: scale
methods.description: Returns the value of the scale record component.

methods.name: elementShader
methods.description: Returns the value of the elementShader record component.

methods.name: colourScheme
methods.description: Returns the value of the colourScheme record component.

methods.name: performance
methods.description: Returns the value of the performance record component.
